00019 void CLogFile::CreateLogfile(const char *LogName)
00020 {
00021  // Open and empty the log file
00022  m_Logfile = OpenGameFile(LogName, "wt");
00023  
00024  // Write the head
00025  textOut("<html><head><title>LogFile</title></head>");
00026  textOut("<body><font face='courier new'>");
00027  WriteTopic("Logfile", 3);
00028  textOut(BLUE,REVISION);
00029  
00030  // Mark the Build and Platform
00031 #ifdef DEBUG
00032  textOut("BUILD: DEBUG<br>");
00033 #else
00034  textOut("BUILD: RELEASE<br>");
00035 #endif
00036  
00037 #ifdef TARGET_LNX
00038  textOut("PLATFORM: LINUX<br>");
00039 #elif TARGET_WIN32
00040  textOut("PLATFORM: WINDOWS<br>");
00041 #elif __APPLE__
00042  textOut("PLATFORM: MAC OS X<br>");
00043 #else
00044  textOut("PLATFORM: UNKNOWN<br>");
00045 #endif
00046 
00047  // Ads
00048  textOut("<br>");
00049     textOut("by The CloneKeenPlus Team 2009<br>");
00050     textOut("<br>");
00051     textOut("BY FANS, FOR FANS. ALL \"COMMANDER KEEN\" GRAPHICS,<br>");
00052     textOut("SOUND, AND LEVEL FILES ARE THE PROPERTY OF ID SOFTWARE.<br>");
00053     textOut("<br>");
00054  
00055  // Show my e-mail adress
00056  textOut("<a href='mailto:gerstrong@gmail.com?subject=CG Logfile'>");
00057  textOut("Send E-Mail to me</a><br><br>");
00058  
00059  fclose(m_Logfile);
00060  m_Logfile = OpenGameFile(LogName, "at");
00061 }

00063 // Function for writing the topic
00064 void CLogFile::WriteTopic(const char *Topic, int Size)
00065 {
00066  textOut("<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' width='100%%' bgcolor='#DFDFE5'>\n");
00067  textOut("<tr>\n<tr>\n<td>\n");
00068  ftextOut("<font face='arial' size='+%i'>\n", Size);
00069  textOut(Topic);
00070  textOut("</font>\n</td>\n</tr>\n</table>\n<br>");
00071  fflush(m_Logfile);
00072 }

00078 // Now with colors
00079 void CLogFile::textOut(FONTCOLORS Color, const std::string& Text)
00080 {
00081  textOut(Color, false, Text);
00082 }
00083 
00084 // Now the entire definition (with list and color)
00085 void CLogFile::textOut(FONTCOLORS Color, bool List, const std::string& Text)
00086 {
00087  if(List == true)
00088   textOut("<li>");
00089  
00090  // write color tag
00091  switch(Color)
00092  {
00093   case BLACK:
00094    textOut("<font color=black>"); break;
00095   case RED:
00096    textOut("<font color=red>"); break;
00097   case GREEN:
00098    textOut("<font color=green>"); break;
00099   case BLUE:
00100    textOut("<font color=blue>"); break;
00101   case PURPLE:
00102    textOut("<font color=purple>"); break;
00103  };
00104  
00105  // Write the text
00106  textOut(Text);
00107  textOut("</font>");
00108  
00109  if (List == false)
00110   textOut("<br>");
00111  else
00112   textOut("</li>");
00113 }

00115 
00116 std::string CLogFile::removeHTML(const std::string& input)
00117 {
00118     std::string::size_type left, right;
00119     std::string output;
00120  
00121     output = input;
00122     do {
00123         left  = output.find_first_of('<', 0);
00124         right = output.find_first_of('>', 0);
00125   
00126         if( left == std::string::npos || right == std::string::npos )
00127             break;
00128   
00129         output = output.erase( left, right-left+1 );
00130     } while( 1 );
00131  
00132     return output;
00133 }
00134 
00135 void CLogFile::textOut(const std::string& Text)
00136 {
00137     std::string output;
00138  
00139     output = removeHTML(Text);
00140     if( output.length() > 0 ) {
00141         notes << output << endl;
00142     }
00143  fprintf(m_Logfile,"%s",Text.c_str());
00144  fflush(m_Logfile);
00145 }

00147 void CLogFile::ftextOut(const char *Text, ...)
00148 {
00149  char buffer[MAX_BUFFER];
00150  va_list pArgList;
00151  
00152  va_start(pArgList, Text);
00153  vsprintf(buffer, Text, pArgList);
00154  va_end(pArgList);
00155  
00156  textOut(buffer);
00157 }

00160 {
00161  char buffer[MAX_BUFFER];

00163  
00164  va_start(pArgList, Text);
00165  vsprintf(buffer, Text, pArgList);
00166  va_end(pArgList);
00167  
00168  textOut(Color, List, buffer);
00169 }

00171 void CLogFile::ftextOut(FONTCOLORS Color, const char *Text, ...)
00172 {
00173  char buffer[MAX_BUFFER];
00174  va_list pArgList;
00175  
00176  va_start(pArgList, Text);
00177  vsprintf(buffer, Text, pArgList);
00178  va_end(pArgList);
00179  
00180  textOut(Color, buffer);
00181 }

00183 void CLogFile::FunctionResult (const char *Name,bool Result)
00184 {
00185  if (Result == true)
00186  {
00187   textOut("<table width='100%%' cellSpacing='1' cellPadding='5'>");
00188   textOut(" border='0' bgcolor='C0C0C0'><tr><td bgcolor=");
00189   ftextOut("'#FFFFFF' width='35%%'>%s</TD>", Name);
00190   textOut("<td bgcolor='#FFFFFF' width='30%%'><font color =");
00191   textOut("'green'>OK</FONT></TD><td bgcolor='#FFFFFF' ");
00192   textOut("width='35%%'>-/-</TD></tr></table>");
00193  }
00194  else
00195  {
00196   textOut("<table width='100%%' cellSpacing='1' cellPadding='5'>");
00197   textOut(" border='0' bgcolor='C0C0C0'><tr><td bgcolor=");
00198   ftextOut("'#FFFFFF' width='35%%'>%s</TD>", Name);
00199   textOut("<td bgcolor='#FFFFFF' width='30%%'><font color =");
00200   textOut("'red'>ERROR</FONT></TD><td bgcolor='#FFFFFF' ");
00201   textOut("width='35%%'>-/-</TD></tr></table>");
00202  }
00203 }
